content:
PHASE 3 COMPLETE

All four BROWSE/Catalog tasks completed successfully.

TASK RESULTS:
- 3-1 (catalog): CatalogGenerator with ClusterSummary, token budget, 19 tests
- 3-2 (search): SearchIndex with Tantivy full-text search
- 3-3 (browse): GET /notebooks/{id}/browse endpoint with query support
- 3-4 (cache): CatalogCache with stale-while-revalidate, 27 tests

FILES CREATED:
- crates/notebook-entropy/src/{catalog.rs, search.rs, cache.rs}
- crates/notebook-server/src/routes/browse.rs

ENDPOINTS:
- GET /notebooks/{id}/browse?query=&max_tokens=4000

KEY CAPABILITIES:
- Dense catalog summaries within token budget
- Full-text search with Tantivy
- Query-filtered browse results
- Intelligent cache invalidation on high-cost writes
author: orchestrator
